name: Pathway Recruitment
tag_list: recruitment, media, it, science, facilities-management, healthcare, patway-recruitment
overview:
Pathway Recruitment is a long established business offering an inovative recuitment solution to clients throughout the local area. The company, which is based in Walthamstow (London), originally started out in 2007 and has 10 years experience in the in the sales profession.

The company is managed by samuel Dontoh who has been involved in the recruitment industry for many years. Samuel Dontoh is a well established figure within the recruitment industry and aims to look after the company, having previously worked for a host of recruitment organisations.
